description: Product DescriptionORICO 2598US3 Tool Free USB3.0 2.5inch SATA Hard Drive External Enclosure with Unparalleled AluminumCase& Unique Tool Free Design allow to make your Internal 7mm and 9.5mm Slim 2.5 - inch SATA Hard Disk Drive or Solid State Drive External Easily and Quickly.Allow to mount or unmount 2.5" Drive without tools & screws in three second.Allow Multi Drives sharing the Enclosure and accessed from your computer by take one Drive out and put another one in.Aluminum Case Lightand Slim,OfferExcellent Protection and HEAT Dissipationfor your Valuable DATA and Drives.ORICO 2598US3 build-in Low Power Super Speed USB3.0 Controller offer an Easy & Reliable Connectivity up to 5Gbps and compatible with USB2.0 &USB1.1.Ready; for Hot Swap,Plug & Play,All you need is plug it to your computer,No Reboot and Additional Driver is needed,No Additional Power Adapter is needed as well.Allow to enjoy a Super-Speed Accessing for your Video,Photo,Music and files regardless at Home,Office or Studio with any Desktop or Laptop via USB Port.ORICO 2598US3 is a Super Compact and Slim Enclosure easy to slip into your bag or pocket for carrying and traveling.2 Ft USB Cable included for an Easy Accessing.If you are looking for something to make your Internal Drives External,ORICO 2598US3Tool Free USB3.0 Enclosure will be an Ideal Solution for you.What's in the Box1x ORICO 2598US31x 2Ft. USB3.0Type A Male to Micro B Male Cable1x User's Manual1x Warranty CardNote:Hard Drive in Pictures is for Reference Only and not included.
title: ORICO 2598US3-BK Tool Free Portable USB 3.0 2.5 " SATA Hard Drive External Enclosure
